name: HyperFast
description:
GET READY TO GO FAST! HyperFast is a challenging single-player time-trial game, where you compete against yourself to unlock each level. Master racing through all the colorful environments at break-neck speeds!

Featuring:

  • 8 different courses
  • 3 game modes
  • Original soundtrack
  • Retro FX setting
  • Play with keyboard or gamepad

Linux has NOT been tested. Please try the demo before purchasing and contact me if you have any problems.

Support, questions, feedback, email: Games@virtueone.com
